DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective study to compare clinical results of patients that were treated by Bipolar H.A. vs. closed reduction and internal fixation with Trochanteric Antegrade Nail for displaced femoral subcapital fracture.
DOC.brief_title: Bipolar H.A Versus Trochanteric Antegrade Nail for Treatment of Displaced Subcapital Femoral Fractures
DOC.criteria: Displaced femoral subcapital fracture. Active patient. Age 4085. Patient was treated by one of the two methods. Age out of range.
